mn126:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
mn126:3.3: Atha kho āyasmā bhūmijo pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena jayasenassa rājakumārassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
mn126:3.5: Atha kho jayaseno rājakumāro yenāyasmā bhūmijo tenupasaṅkami;
mn126:3.7: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
mn126:3.8: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho jayaseno rājakumāro āyasmantaṃ bhūmijaṃ etadavoca:
mn126:3.9: “santi, bho bhūmija, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn126:3.10: ‘āsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:3.11: anāsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:3.12: āsañca anāsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:3.13: nevāsaṃ nānāsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāyā’ti.
mn126:3.14: Idha bhoto bhūmijassa satthā kiṃvādī kimakkhāyī”ti? “
mn126:3.15: Na kho metaṃ, rājakumāra, bhagavato sammukhā sutaṃ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ.
mn126:3.16: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ vijjati yaṃ bhagavā evaṃ byākareyya:
mn126:3.17: ‘āsañcepi karitvā ayoniso brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:3.18: anāsañcepi karitvā ayoniso brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:3.19: āsañca anāsañcepi karitvā ayoniso brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:3.20: nevāsaṃ nānāsañcepi karitvā ayoniso brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya.
mn126:3.21: Āsañcepi karitvā yoniso brahmacariyaṃ caranti, bhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:3.22: anāsañcepi karitvā yoniso brahmacariyaṃ caranti, bhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:3.23: āsañca anāsañcepi karitvā yoniso brahmacariyaṃ caranti, bhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:3.24: nevāsaṃ nānāsañcepi karitvā yoniso brahmacariyaṃ caranti, bhabbā phalassa adhigamāyā’ti.
mn126:3.25: Na kho me taṃ, rājakumāra, bhagavato sammukhā sutaṃ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ.
mn126:3.26: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ vijjati yaṃ bhagavā evaṃ byākareyyā”ti. “
mn126:3.27: Sace kho bhoto bhūmijassa satthā evaṃvādī evamakkhāyī, addhā bhoto bhūmijassa satthā sabbesaṃyeva puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ muddhānaṃ maññe āhacca tiṭṭhatī”ti.
mn126:3.28: Atha kho jayaseno rājakumāro āyasmantaṃ bhūmijaṃ sakeneva thālipākena parivisi.
mn126:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā bhūmijo pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn126:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā bhūmijo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn126:4.4: “idhāhaṃ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena jayasenassa rājakumārassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃ;
mn126:4.6: Atha kho, bhante, jayaseno rājakumāro yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
mn126:4.8: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
mn126:4.9: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho, bhante, jayaseno rājakumāro maṃ etadavoca:
mn126:4.10: ‘santi, bho bhūmija, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino—
mn126:4.11: āsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:4.14: āsañca anāsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:4.15: nevāsaṃ nānāsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāyā’ti.
mn126:4.17: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, bhante, jayasenaṃ rājakumāraṃ etadavocaṃ:
mn126:4.18: ‘na kho me taṃ, rājakumāra, bhagavato sammukhā sutaṃ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ.
mn126:4.19: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ vijjati yaṃ bhagavā evaṃ byākareyya—
mn126:4.20: āsañcepi karitvā ayoniso brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:4.21: anāsañcepi karitvā ayoniso brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:4.22: āsañca anāsañcepi karitvā ayoniso brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:4.23: nevāsaṃ nānāsañcepi karitvā ayoniso brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya.
mn126:4.24: Āsañcepi karitvā yoniso brahmacariyaṃ caranti, bhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:4.29: nevāsaṃ nānāsañcepi karitvā yoniso brahmacariyaṃ caranti, bhabbā phalassa adhigamāyāti.
mn126:4.30: Na kho me taṃ, rājakumāra, bhagavato sammukhā sutaṃ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ.
mn126:4.31: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ vijjati yaṃ bhagavā evaṃ byākareyyā’ti.
mn126:4.32: ‘Sace bhoto bhūmijassa satthā evaṃvādī evamakkhāyī, addhā bhoto bhūmijassa satthā sabbesaṃyeva puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ muddhānaṃ maññe āhacca tiṭṭhatī’ti.
mn126:4.33: ‘Kaccāhaṃ, bhante, evaṃ puṭṭho evaṃ byākaramāno vuttavādī ceva bhagavato homi, na ca bhagavantaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhāmi, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākaromi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchatī’”ti?
mn126:5.1: “Taggha tvaṃ, bhūmija, evaṃ puṭṭho evaṃ byākaramāno vuttavādī ceva me hosi, na ca maṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhasi, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarosi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati.
mn126:5.2: Ye hi keci, bhūmija, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā micchādiṭṭhino micchāsaṅkappā micchāvācā micchākammantā micchāājīvā micchāvāyāmā micchāsatī micchāsamādhino te āsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:5.3: anāsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:5.4: āsañca anāsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:5.5: nevāsaṃ nānāsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya.
mn126:6.1: Seyyathāpi, bhūmija, puriso telatthiko telagavesī telapariyesanaṃ caramāno vālikaṃ doṇiyā ākiritvā udakena paripphosakaṃ paripphosakaṃ pīḷeyya.
mn126:6.2: Āsañcepi karitvā vālikaṃ doṇiyā ākiritvā udakena paripphosakaṃ paripphosakaṃ pīḷeyya, abhabbo telassa adhigamāya;
mn126:6.3: anāsañcepi karitvā vālikaṃ doṇiyā ākiritvā udakena paripphosakaṃ paripphosakaṃ pīḷeyya, abhabbo telassa adhigamāya;
mn126:6.4: āsañca anāsañcepi karitvā vālikaṃ doṇiyā ākiritvā udakena paripphosakaṃ paripphosakaṃ pīḷeyya, abhabbo telassa adhigamāya;
mn126:6.5: nevāsaṃ nānāsañcepi karitvā vālikaṃ doṇiyā ākiritvā udakena paripphosakaṃ paripphosakaṃ pīḷeyya, abhabbo telassa adhigamāya.
mn126:6.8: Evameva kho, bhūmija, ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā micchādiṭṭhino micchāsaṅkappā micchāvācā micchākammantā micchāājīvā micchāvāyāmā micchāsatī micchāsamādhino te āsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:6.9: anāsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:6.10: āsañca anāsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya;
mn126:6.11: nevāsaṃ nānāsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya.
mn126:7.1: Seyyathāpi, bhūmija, puriso khīratthiko khīragavesī khīrapariyesanaṃ caramāno gāviṃ taruṇavacchaṃ visāṇato āviñcheyya.
mn126:7.2: Āsañcepi karitvā gāviṃ taruṇavacchaṃ visāṇato āviñcheyya, abhabbo khīrassa adhigamāya;
mn126:7.7: nevāsaṃ nānāsañcepi karitvā gāviṃ taruṇavacchaṃ visāṇato āviñcheyya, abhabbo khīrassa adhigamāya.

mn126:7.17: nevāsaṃ nānāsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya.
mn126:8.1: Seyyathāpi, bhūmija, puriso navanītatthiko navanītagavesī navanītapariyesanaṃ caramāno udakaṃ kalase āsiñcitvā matthena āviñcheyya.
mn126:8.2: Āsañcepi karitvā udakaṃ kalase āsiñcitvā matthena āviñcheyya, abhabbo navanītassa adhigamāya;
mn126:8.7: nevāsaṃ nānāsañcepi karitvā udakaṃ kalase āsiñcitvā matthena āviñcheyya, abhabbo navanītassa adhigamāya.
mn126:8.10: Evameva kho, bhūmija, ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā micchādiṭṭhino …

mn126:9.1: Seyyathāpi, bhūmija, puriso aggitthiko aggigavesī aggipariyesanaṃ caramāno allaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ sasnehaṃ uttarāraṇiṃ ādāya abhimantheyya.
mn126:9.2: Āsañcepi karitvā allaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ sasnehaṃ uttarāraṇiṃ ādāya abhimantheyya, abhabbo aggissa adhigamāya;
mn126:9.7: nevāsaṃ nānāsañcepi karitvā allaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ sasnehaṃ uttarāraṇiṃ ādāya abhimantheyya, abhabbo aggissa adhigamāya.

mn126:14.1: Sace kho taṃ, bhūmija, jayasenassa rājakumārassa imā catasso upamā paṭibhāyeyyuṃ anacchariyaṃ te jayaseno rājakumāro pasīdeyya, pasanno ca te pasannākāraṃ kareyyā”ti.
mn126:14.2: “Kuto pana maṃ, bhante, jayasenassa rājakumārassa imā catasso upamā paṭibhāyissanti anacchariyā pubbe assutapubbā, seyyathāpi bhagavantan”ti?
mn126:15.2: Attamano āyasmā bhūmijo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
